title: 7-8am- Holiday Specials & the Worlds Dirtiest Man
itunes:title: 7-8am- Holiday Specials & the Worlds Dirtiest Man
description: There is going to be a Guardians of the Galaxy holiday special, Vinnie is excited for the Mysterious Benedict Society, Zoe Saldana says that the new Avatar movie required a specialist to show the actors how to hold their breath underwater, Reba McEntire found love, there is a 30th anniversary Beauty and the Beast special, some fast facts, what happened to Olivia Newton-John’s husband, the world’s dirtiest man died, and Vinnie reads your texts!
